verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

רְאֵ֖ה <WH7200> See קָרָ֣אתִֽי <WH7121> I have called בְשֵׁ֑ם <WH8034> by name בְּצַלְאֵ֛ל <WH1212> Bezaleel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אוּרִ֥י <WH221> of Uri בֶן־ <WH1121> the son ח֖וּר <WH2354> of Hur לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וָאֲמַלֵּ֥א <WH4390> And I have filled אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> him with the spirit אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God בְּחָכְמָ֛ה <WH2451> in wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָ֥ה <WH8394> and in understanding וּבְדַ֖עַת <WH1847> and in knowledge וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all מְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> and in all manner of workmanship
לַחְשֹׁ֖ב <WH2803> To devise מַחֲשָׁבֹ֑ת <WH4284> cunning works לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <WH6213> to work בַּזָּהָ֥ב <WH2091> in gold וּבַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> and in silver וּבַנְּחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> and in brass

וּבַחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <WH2799> And in cutting אֶ֛בֶן <WH68> of stones לְמַלֹּ֖את <WH4390> to set וּבַחֲרֹ֣שֶׁת <WH2799> [them] and in carving עֵ֑ץ <WH6086> of timber לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> to work בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> in all manner of workmanship

וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> Myself הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> and behold נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> And I behold I have given אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for אֵ֣ת <WH853> אָהֳלִיאָ֞ב <WH171> with him Aholiab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִֽיסָמָךְ֙ <WH294> of Ahisamach לְמַטֵּה־ <WH4294> of the tribe דָ֔ן <WH1835> of Dan וּבְלֵ֥ב <WH3820> and in the hearts כָּל־ <WH3605> of all חֲכַם־ <WH2450> of all that are wise לֵ֖ב <WH3820> hearted נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> I have put חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom וְעָשׂ֕וּ <WH6213> that they may make אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i צִוִּיתִֽךָ׃ <WH6680> all that I have commanded

אֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> The tabernacle מוֹעֵ֗ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאָרֹן֙ <WH727> and the ark לָֽעֵדֻ֔ת <WH5715> of the testimony וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכַּפֹּ֖רֶת <WH3727> and the mercy seat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> that [is] thereupon and all the furniture הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> of the tabernacle

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ <WH7979> And the table וְאֶת־ <WH853> כֵּלָ֔יו <WH3627> and his furniture וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּנֹרָ֥ה <WH4501> candlestick הַטְּהֹרָ֖ה <WH2889> and the pure וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כֵּלֶ֑יהָ <WH3627> with all his furniture וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> and the altar הַקְּטֹֽרֶת׃ <WH7004> of incense

וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> And the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> with all his furniture וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּיּ֖וֹר <WH3595> and the laver וְאֶת־ <WH853> כַּנּֽוֹ׃ <WH3653> and his foot

וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֣י <WH899> And the cloths הַשְּׂרָ֑ד <WH8278> of service וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֤י <WH899> garments הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> and the holy לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> for Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֥י <WH899> and the garments בָנָ֖יו <WH1121> of his sons לְכַהֵֽן׃ <WH3547> to minister in the priest's office

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> שֶׁ֧מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֛ה <WH4888> And the anointing וְאֶת־ <WH853> קְטֹ֥רֶת <WH7004> incense הַסַּמִּ֖ים <WH5561> and sweet לַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> for the holy כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> i צִוִּיתִ֖ךָ <WH6680> [place] according to all that I have commanded יַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> thee shall they do פ
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you דַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> thou also unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אַ֥ךְ <WH389> Verily אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֖י <WH7676> my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <WH8104> ye shall keep כִּי֩ <WH3588> for is a א֨וֹת <WH226> for it [is] a sign הִ֜וא <WH1931> he בֵּינִ֤י <WH996> between וּבֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <WH996> between לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> between me and you throughout your generations לָדַ֕עַת <WH3045> that [ye] may know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD מְקַדִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH6942> that doth sanctify

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <WH8104> Ye shall keep אֶת־ <WH853> הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> the sabbath כִּ֛י <WH3588> for קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> therefore for it [is] holy הִ֖וא <WH1931> he לָכֶ֑ם מְחַֽלְלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH2490> unto you every one that defileth מ֣וֹת <WH4191> it shall surely יוּמָ֔ת <WH4191> be put to death כִּ֗י <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever הָעֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> for whosoever doeth בָהּ֙ מְלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> [any] work וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> therein that soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he מִקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> from among עַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH5971> his people

שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> Six יָמִים֮ <WH3117> days יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> be done מְלָאכָה֒ <WH4399> may work וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> but in the seventh שַׁבַּ֧ת <WH7676> [is] the sabbath שַׁבָּת֛וֹן <WH7677> of rest קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> holy לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever הָעֹשֶׂ֧ה <WH6213> whosoever doeth מְלָאכָ֛ה <WH4399> [any] work בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֖ת <WH7676> in the sabbath מ֥וֹת <WH4191> he shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> be put to death

וְשָׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> shall keep בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> Wherefore the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> the sabbath לַעֲשׂ֧וֹת <WH6213> to observe אֶת־ <WH853> הַשַּׁבָּ֛ת <WH7676> the sabbath לְדֹרֹתָ֖ם <WH1755> throughout their generations בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> [for] a perpetual

בֵּינִ֗י <WH996> between וּבֵין֙ <WH996> between בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> between me and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel א֥וֹת <WH226> It [is] a sign הִ֖וא <WH1931> he לְעֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever כִּי־ <WH3588> in שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> for [in] six יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> days עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> made יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> heaven וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> and earth וּבַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> and on the seventh שָׁבַ֖ת <WH7673> he rested וַיִּנָּפַֽשׁ׃ <WH5314> and was refreshed ס

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> And he gave אֶל־ <WH413> about מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses כְּכַלֹּתוֹ֙ <WH3615> when he had made an end לְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> of communing אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> upon בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> with him upon mount סִינַ֔י <WH5514> Sinai שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> two לֻחֹ֣ת <WH3871> tables הָעֵדֻ֑ת <WH5715> of testimony לֻחֹ֣ת <WH3871> tables אֶ֔בֶן <WH68> of stone כְּתֻבִ֖ים <WH3789> written בְּאֶצְבַּ֥ע <WH676> with the finger אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God
